score_py.description: Check that the file "score.py" exists and is in the top level directory of the artifact directory

runtime_yaml.description: Check that the file "runtime.yaml" exists and is in the top level directory of the artifact directory

score_syntax.error_msg: There is Syntax error in score.py:

score_predict_data.description: Check that the only required argument for predict() is named "data"
score_predict_data.error_msg: The predict function in score.py must have a formal argument named 'data'.

score_predict_arg.description: Check that all other arguments in predict() are optional and have default values
score_predict_arg.error_msg: All formal arguments in the predict function must have default values, except that 'data' argument.

runtime_version.description: Check that field MODEL_ARTIFACT_VERSION is set to 3.0

runtime_env_python.description: Check that field MODEL_DEPLOYMENT.INFERENCE_PYTHON_VERSION is set to a value of 3.6 or higher

runtime_env_path.description: Check that field MODEL_DEPLOYMENT.INFERENCE_ENV_PATH is set

runtime_path_exist.description: Check that the file path in MODEL_DEPLOYMENT.INFERENCE_ENV_PATH is correct.
